replies.msg: 真小丑神
希望Bruce大個之後個樣唔好崩壞

其實Jim同Bruce兩個演員d戲都好屎
成套劇真係全靠奸角
但好多季都係一開頭好好睇玩到好大
去到中間就開始拖
仲有d人無限復活睇到厭
一個半個都冇乜問題，但用到爛咁滯
不過講到尾套劇都係以玩奸角為重心
岀得多滿足到fans
只係有時覺得佢為左岀多d經典角色搞到劇情鬆散
睇左幾季最深刻又真係做得好得joker
冷凍人好似成日比人召喚岀黎噴幾下又冇佢既事

希望最後一季劇情可以集中d，埋得好好睇睇

replies.msg: "Through the efforts of Lucius Fox, Batman succeeds in getting the attention of Lex Luthor, who arrives in Gotham with plans to completely rebuild the city. Attempts by the Joker to disrupt construction are thwarted by Bane, who has been hired by Luthor in exchange for his own private country. Bane, who has been causing trouble in No Man's Land before, is looking to get revenge on Batman, who convinces him to leave and claim his payment before Luthor reneges on their deal."
